---
title: "R Notebook"
---

```{r}
library(rvest)

ioRadData <- read_html("ioRadDemonstrations/tutorialOne_importTab.html")
```

```{r}
ioRadData %>%
  html_elements("[src]") %>%
  html_attr("src") %>%
  unique() %>%
  walk(~ {
    
    if(str_detect(.,"step_number=")){
     
      imName <- str_extract(.,"tutorial_id=[0-9]{1,}\\&step_number=[0-9]{1,}")
    
    # browser()
    
    im <- magick::image_read(path = .,) %>%
      magick::image_ggplot()
      # magick::image_convert(format = "png")
    
    ggsave(filename = paste0("ioRadPictures/",imName,".png"),plot = im)
    
    # knitr::plot_crop(paste0("ioRadPictures/",imName,".png"))
    
    # magick::image_write(image = im,path = paste0("ioRadPictures/",imName,".png"))
       
    }
    
  })
```
